description.title: What is this about?
description.intro: We analyzed the visual impact of campaign posters and compared how they communicate ideas.
description.sampleText: Please describe how this poster visually communicates the party’s main messages and values.

home.second_headline: AI asked - How is Dortmund changing through politics...

gen_ai_box.title: What is GenAI
gen_ai_box.text_p1: Our project is about preparing the election programs for the Dortmund local election on
gen_ai_box.text_p3: The election programs were provided to a generative language model (our AI), which was tasked with identifying similarities and differences between the programs. These findings were then passed on to an image-generating AI with the goal of illustrating the core points of the election programs using images from Dortmund.
gen_ai_box.image_select: Select an image to see the results:
